title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your spontaneous self-expression might erupt suddenly like a volcano today, rather than flow smoothly like a stream. The Scorpio New Moon activates your 5th House of Creativity, triggering your need to engage your muse through artful ingenuity. You might reflect on why your esthetic originality has been blocked by your own self-limiting thinking or by the dismissal of others. But theres no refuting that you must unleash your lush imagination and artistic passions through a creative medium. Own your power, and you will intuitively discover what you need to do next. Poet Arthur Rimbaud wrote, Genius is the recovery of childhood at will. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
